verbose_text: Combining data from both series of Gdf1 rescue experiments, 25/61 (41%) of Tbx6 homozygous mutants with Gdf1 restored in the perinodal region showed left sided Pitx2 expression (with a single embryo showing right sided expression), compared with 8/53 (15%) showing left sided expression without the transgene (Chi 2 = 8, P < 0.01).
